website_summaries.verdict: The best value 18-inch subwoofer for a decent upgrade in performance and volume.
pros: Ultra-high quality components place this budget subwoofer above most value options in terms of durability
cons: Speaker requires a little bit of time to warm up when first turned on

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk😕
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for replacement for my sonic pa sub received it package looked great sub looked good but when I hooked it up omg the sound was absolutely junk alot of mechanical noise at very low volume I don't think I have been this disappointed in a product wanted to return but couldn't now I'm stuck with a 26 pound peace of junk and now I'm out the money I spent on it I feel like I was robbed buyers beware buy at your own risk i do not recommend this product sry Rockville but the truth is in the product you sell,,
customer_reviews.author: Roger D.

customer_reviews.title: Powered by an iNuke 3000dsp in bridged mode and these things are a perfect match for that amp
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and installed into a pair of custom made bins. Powered by an iNuke 3000dsp in bridged mode and these things are a perfect match for that amp. Punchy, clean with no distortion running amp at 70 to 90%. I have 2 live outdoor shows on these and could not be happier. Amazing value. Packaged nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, great sound, right price
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research I decided to go with these sub woofers. I replaced 2 blown Peavey 1801-8 with these and I was thoroughly impressed. Great bass response. My PA towers get used once a week so I don't know how well they would hold up in a professional environment where they were used daily but for my application I have no issues what so ever. I will definitely be using Rockville's to replace some blown 15's I have in another cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: not sure if it can handle the 1500 it claims, as with a KM750 it starts to "fart" alot when driven near the amps clip. but for 50$, it handles quite nicely. i slapped it in my 310 liter/11.1cuft box and it does quite well as a subwoofer, easily as good as my Skar 15" i previously had in it. will likely be picking up 2 more, or if the 18's come back in stock 2 of those to slap into a massive 22Cuft box. im quite sure they will provide that "kick to the chest" feeling that a good speaker does.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great sub for not much cash!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the driver in the powered sub at the night club where I work. We are a small operation and every penny counts. I waited a couple months before posting a review to see how it was going to hold up. So far it has exceeded my expectations. It sounds really good and handles 5 hours of pounding a night, 4-5 nights a week. Seems to be a great buy for the money, far, far better than the Pyle sub that only lasted a few months, despite having higher wattage ratings and a much bigger magnet. Seems to be a solid buy for short money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Richard

customer_reviews.title: Watt ratings are not what they say,
customer_reviews.text: The watt ratings is wrong on this, not sure how they got these numbers but way off , maybe good speakers for a 300 watt amp but nothing more
customer_reviews.author: Ross M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great subwoofer!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 750watts rms going to this subwoofer and it slams.. very deep bass.. excellent bass response. I build my own sub box for it (My very first time doing that) and it rocks.. I plan on getting another but just this one have my ears hurting after I bump it.. great woofer
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality... running it through a Low Pass filter on amp for Sub's.... It shook my room without an enclosure. I will be getting another one!  Update: I just used this in a 2.1 pa System to Dj a wedding Reception with some 12" 250watt mains using a low pass and high pass crossover filter . These sound great as subs. I will be doing some live music later this summer. I am looking forward to hear what 2 of these can do with some 15" tops.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Raines

customer_reviews.title: Awesome replacement speaker
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Mackie 18 inch sub speaker with this. Not a perfect fit but frankly, sound-wise, it’s an upgrade. The low end really pops with this speaker, did not realize how much better the old Mackie sub would sound.
customer_reviews.author: Dyane

customer_reviews.title: Great value and Crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: Price and Sound made me choose "Rockville" I have 4-12" and 2-18" already and i am very happy with the sound.Loud and Crisp,
customer_reviews.author: David Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as Promised
customer_reviews.text: I swapped these with some old Nady 350 watt subs, using the same cabinets. These things really kick with the right power and crossover. My only wish, which has absolutely nothing to do with performance, is that they would take the time to center the cone with the screw holes. No biggie ultimately, I just had to take a few extra seconds to center it correctly. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: MusicmanPro

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: walled 4 of these in my 98 s10 in a sealed wall at 2ohms overall on apcl3k at 2ohms and it smashes sounds so clear and punchy along with plenty of low end also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic subwoofer!
customer_reviews.text: Great sub from the price. The first one I received was defective out other the box(third picture) the center pole of the magnet was off center. It happens, the sub was quickly replaced and now the shop is lively again. I will definitely recommend and will be ordering at least one more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers very impressive
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a replacement for my peavys and thoroughly impressed with them great bass I have them hooked to a Peavy cs1000x and have run them for hours cranked and took every second of it like it was nothing a definite must buy if you have the power to run them anyway
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Dr ordered
customer_reviews.text: Did not like packaging, dence foam packaging inside of box was broken when arrived 2 of 2 broken, but speakers were fine no damage, these speakers sound great, what a value, would recommend for replacements or building PA speaker boxes
customer_reviews.author: Michael Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Powerful sound and value
customer_reviews.text: I use these for a pair of high end, down-firing passive subwoofers without separate amplifiers. Way more than enough capacity to handle any kind of wattage. Incredible addition and amazing sound.
customer_reviews.author: br. mak

customer_reviews.title: For the money it’s a good sub
customer_reviews.text: Using this in a home studio with an acoustic drum set present. It is loud enough to balance out the noise of a full kit so it’s perfect. I would reccomend this if you are looking for something to use at home with a full size PA or in a gig between 300-500 people. Note: make sure you have solid tweeter speakers(800watts) minimum each otherwise this sub will overpower them.
customer_reviews.author: TrevorG

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got 4 of them , they last 4 hour, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: arnulfo

customer_reviews.title: LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Not using them for their correct intended purpose. I have one of them in my maxima on low power and these things are mean for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tre

customer_reviews.title: Kicks ass!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is killer. I only have it hooked up to an amp that is rated for half the program power of this sub but it still moves air like crazy! I can’t wait to get my new amp to really get that thing to full power. Sounds great in the custom box I made. You won’t find a better 18” woofer for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it low frequency
customer_reviews.text: This subwoofer meets all of my expectations easily. I don't have much wealth so I must make my lower end stuff sound higher end. I am totally impressed with Rockville quality. I am building an enclosure for another one of these subs.
customer_reviews.author: Pegleg

customer_reviews.title: They sound awesome
customer_reviews.text: These where used in a dual15 inch box ....they sound great bass hits hard ....but I cranked them a little to much one of them is popping already but other wise well worth the money ....well made also
customer_reviews.author: Son Elegba

customer_reviews.title: ... woofer at an event this weekend and it sounded great..
customer_reviews.text: Finally was able to try out this new woofer at an event this weekend and it sounded great...Rockville bumps hard
customer_reviews.author: DJ UPLATE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price, can't beat PRIME
customer_reviews.text: I build my own speakers and this subwoofer, really puts out the sound. Excellent, excellent quality and was delivered to my door in perfect condition. The merchant packed it well and arrived save and sound.
customer_reviews.author: James Ziessler

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I was very hesitant on these due to price but these things will take a beating! I rebuilt some old DJ equipment with them and I’m IMPRESSED. I drove the crap out of them with a 2400X2 and they just shrugged it off. I’ve spent a lot more money for much crappier stuff. RECCOMEND!
customer_reviews.author: James Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Thumbs!!!
customer_reviews.text: If Everything Finger Was a Thump These Speakers Deserve It. Awesome Handling Power. Will Give You The Confidence You Deserve. Unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elite DJ Services Erie, Pa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Running them at 1000w rms per speaker and they lasted 2 days. They did sound very good while they were alive but it seems to me that they lack a heat sink or a good way to disapate the heat. They are both welded solid and sound more like tweeters now. Cheap is cheap I guess. Spend the extra money and get B&C or PRV.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime R

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought one, whole magnet hanging off the back amazon sent replacement same thing, I have other stuff from the same company
customer_reviews.author: Devin Computers

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my 18'' EV sub-par subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: WOW, Replaced my broken EV sub with this. Sounds great. Will report back after some extended use
customer_reviews.author: Silver Bullet

customer_reviews.title: A lot of speaker for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Very well packed for shipping, great soeaker for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: constant variable

customer_reviews.title: its a
customer_reviews.text: great sound, wish they would put these as a standard in their sub-woofers.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of 8 ohm 18" subs, and a pair of the 4 ohm subs. With the RIGHT CABINETS, these things KICK!!!
customer_reviews.author: David S Morton Sr.

customer_reviews.title: have to say they sound great and hit hard
customer_reviews.text: Picked up a pair of these speakers to replace some old vintage Peavey FH-1 low frequency enclosures BW Mark 3..sealed enclosures.have to say they sound great and hit hard..and have no problem for long term use.or hours of use.hold up well so far..
customer_reviews.author: mark kibbey

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely a great Subwoofer Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, Great Rich Sound, Right up in the category of woofers costing twice as much, I think you will be happy with these speakers, I will buy them again for projects in the future.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the reviews. I was not sure based ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the reviews. I was not sure based on price but this speaker after warm up period really hits low. Running in my AT15''s with 400 watts and they rock.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Walters Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Verry good
customer_reviews.text: Do you speakers the very good quality metal basket N what I like about it good sites magnet but the trick is gotta build or have the appropriate speaker Box so this way you can get a Max base out of it
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Strong speaker good price
customer_reviews.text: Very good speaker. I know a lot of DJs use them but they work very well with a live band PA system.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Adato

customer_reviews.title: Good after repacement
customer_reviews.text: First one I got blew in a week. Amazon sent me a new one and that one has been working well for the past 2 month. Kinda thought it might be louder but that might be the amp.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Evans

customer_reviews.title: Not loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 1800 watt 18”s The boxing is done very well but it just doesn’t quite rival the fact that the subs really aren’t loud whatsoever. I have plenty of amp(5500) watts and these aren’t even louder than my tiny 800 watt 12” sub.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Maitland

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Added these as replacements in center 15 towers work impressively
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Re My Rockville Subwoofers
customer_reviews.text: I am currently building my Subwoofer Enclosures. So I am not done as of yet. I need some 2 conductor 8 gauge copper speaker wire for my Rockville Subs. And finally my shirt size is XL. Thanks. Howard
customer_reviews.author: Howard Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Knock off product
customer_reviews.text: Item is not Rockville quality and did not last 2 min on 200rms for 2 subs. Also one of the dust cones came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for budget production companies
customer_reviews.text: This driver has handled everything I have thrown at it. I'm using it for gigs at a venue with a 200 person capacity and it's only let down by the box I have it in. Throw this thing the right amount of power in a good box and I'm sure it'll do what you want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Not as good quality bass as I was hoping for. There is a lot of rattle from the voice coil and it doesn't produce much bass at all.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: ... on each box they are booming the fit was perfect customer service is great the sound from these monsters ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these 2 in each of my subwoofers boxes qsc 2450 bridge on each box they are booming the fit was perfect customer service is great the sound from these monsters are wicked in a good way lol I am gonna order 4 more soon.
customer_reviews.author: ICG PRODUCTIONS

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent product but when you give it about 600 watts on full volume went out EQ it's really staticy.
customer_reviews.author: chase cook

customer_reviews.title: but it sounds pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Use these to replace my prx715 subwoofer . haven't dh'd with it yet.. but it sounds pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy F.

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 the price of a brand name
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Peavey 1808-8 with the RVW1800. Visually looks great and sounds great but I haven’t had the chance to test is in a full band situation.... hoping for the best!
customer_reviews.author: Sdd1262

customer_reviews.title: Great lows, loves wattage!
customer_reviews.text: Great lows, 1000watts going to it and it will soak them all up. Getting the hang of the eq setting was difficult at first but after using it a couple times I've gotten the jist. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome budget boomer!!! Give these things some airspace and let her rip! Super low and tight response.
customer_reviews.author: jason wehmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Life Span.
customer_reviews.text: Two shows within a month’s time and it has already blown. Too bad I missed the return window by 4 days. Save your hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: DJ KNKT

customer_reviews.title: The Overachiever
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely impressed! Never expected this level of performance. Very good bass!
customer_reviews.author: Sound man

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very dissatisfied with the speaker I will never buy another Rockville product again I am very unhappy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Jason resemius

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these to anyone. Had just little over 3 months and there toast! Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: melissa bolmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers for the money
customer_reviews.text: Can’t complain it’s a lot cheaper to buy than any speakers on the market that compares to it
customer_reviews.author: Robert colpritt

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really go wrong for the money, not really sure about the 1500 watt rating but that being said I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: They are solidly built and I love the price point
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these woofers to replace existing woofers in a speaker box. Theae apeaker are all that and more. They can handle the bass and are very crisp sounding. They are solidly built and I love the price point.
customer_reviews.author: pdoss

customer_reviews.title: sounds of power
customer_reviews.text: I have this sub on a 500w bash amplifier and it is amazing in my custom ported box.the box is roughly 3 cubic feet and it shakes everything and barely turn it up. Rockville rocks for the price and is good quality.packaging could be better.
customer_reviews.author: sheila c.

customer_reviews.title: I am a live music sound man. 40 years experiance
customer_reviews.text: this was a replacement for a live music stage monitor. sound quality is very good solid bass.
customer_reviews.author: felix r girouard

customer_reviews.title: These are a still a pass.✔️
customer_reviews.text: Liked the surround sound. Dislike the lack of depth in reality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gonna order 2 more
customer_reviews.text: Priced well below what they should be for the quality that they deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur got me!

customer_reviews.title: half star
customer_reviews.text: If I could leave no stars I would.. save your money
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A STEAL!
customer_reviews.text: wow! Never thought I would find such a great deal on such a big, amazing sub!
customer_reviews.author: Trist

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Item came fast and was just as I expected. No problems at all would definitely recommend and shop with again!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W Davis

customer_reviews.title: I have PA sound system placed then in a double ...
customer_reviews.text: I have PA sound system placed then in a double scoop custom cabinets omg I finnaly got that angry bass that I always wanted
customer_reviews.author: KILLAFACE SIUND STATION

customer_reviews.title: It is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is excellent and the deep bass sound is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tyquan

customer_reviews.title: Being able to return
customer_reviews.text: The return policy I need to send it back so how do I do that
customer_reviews.author: Clarence S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the discount if the products broken.
customer_reviews.text: Hole in speaker. With no returns they got me to be the fool.
customer_reviews.author: Rico Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Omh 8
customer_reviews.text: Omh 8 speaker a must have omh 4 will blow out..
customer_reviews.author: darnell lane

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a blown speaker with this one and sounds great
customer_reviews.author: David Barber

customer_reviews.title: Clean bass!!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my shs audio 15 with the rockville it hit hard n it's really clean bass
customer_reviews.author: Amos

customer_reviews.title: ... starting off as a DJ this would be a good start. I played this with a inuke 3000dsp ...
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is if you're just starting off as a DJ this would be a good start. I played this with a inuke 3000dsp and all I could say is for a cheap price this sucker hit levels of bass that the pricey speakers do.. I only have one now but I'm buying there more to go along with my Rockville 15"powered speakers.. I will update if anything goes wrong
customer_reviews.author: kalyan

customer_reviews.title: NOT THAT GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Came in looks very good but came with a broken terminal and they wont accept returns.....
customer_reviews.author: Gabe M

customer_reviews.title: Thor's hammer can't produce this much base!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace an blown out sub in my old Def Tech bass cube. Love this thing. It really rattles the room during movies, although it's a little slow for music.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 in February to put in 2 home made ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 in February to put in 2 home made cabinets. Can't complain. They are magnificent and for the price. Only wish the magnet was a bit heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Barrington Bogle

customer_reviews.title: Great sub for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great sub for the money ! Makes the house shake!
customer_reviews.author: Rodean Rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastIc woofers so far... excellent range and build quality is pro. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Matt A. Inconiglios

customer_reviews.title: Rockville is Garbage for Real high powered Dj systems
customer_reviews.text: No Good at all My shipment was very badly Bashed also the speakers too Garbage !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good China
customer_reviews.text: Once again people "MADE IN CHINA" normally garbage, but not always. Most name brands outsource to China unless you're talking top of the line. These hit pretty hard, good size magnet, put them in a transmission line box, the whole house shakes like crazy! Sounds clean driving it with the Behringer Inuke 6000. The amp was questionable itself but when I used my QSC RMX 2450 it kept popping the breaker. That amp actually can overpower this speaker. Anyways hits hard, sounds clean, you can tell it is a quality speaker. I have bad China, and good China. This is an example of the GOOD CHINA.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: the bass is just amazing. I have two in a 3 by 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by the subs. I will continue to buy these. the bass is just amazing. I have two in a 3 by 4 foot box. big box very good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: The sub hits well. I had it on a pyramid 2000 watt 2 chanel amp and the amp didnt hold up. Now I have the sub on a 2500 watt amp and it hits pretty damn hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
